description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for the Recommendation Service providing RED metrics (Rate, Errors, Duration), API endpoint analysis, resource utilization, logs, and traces for complete observability

panels.description: High-level metrics providing an overview of the Recommendation Service health and performance
panels.title: ðŸ”¹ Overview

panels.description: Current request rate (requests per second) for the recommendation service. Shows the volume of incoming requests over time. Healthy services typically show consistent patterns with expected peaks during business hours.
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: Percentage of requests resulting in errors. Healthy services should maintain error rates below 5%. Values above 10% indicate service degradation requiring immediate attention.
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: 95th percentile response time in milliseconds. This represents the latency experienced by the slowest 5% of requests. Target: < 500ms (green), Warning: 500-1000ms (yellow), Critical: > 1000ms (red).
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: Distribution of HTTP status codes returned by the recommendation service. Helps identify the proportion of successful (2xx) vs failed (4xx/5xx) requests and understand error patterns.
panels.title: Status Code Breakdown

panels.description: Detailed metrics broken down by individual API endpoints to identify performance bottlenecks and usage patterns
panels.title: ðŸ”¹ API Endpoint Breakdown

panels.description: Request rate per second for each API endpoint. Helps identify which endpoints receive the most traffic and may need optimization or scaling considerations.
panels.title: RPS by API Endpoint

panels.description: Error rate percentage for each API endpoint. Identifies which specific endpoints are experiencing issues or failures.
panels.title: Error Rate by API Endpoint

panels.description: 50th and 95th percentile response times for each API endpoint. Shows both typical and worst-case performance per endpoint.
panels.title: Latency by API Endpoint (p50/p95)

panels.description: Tabular summary of key metrics (RPS, Error Rate, p95 Latency) for each API endpoint, sorted by request volume. Use this for quick identification of problematic endpoints.
panels.title: API Endpoint Summary Table

panels.description: Observability data including application logs and distributed traces for debugging and performance analysis
panels.title: ðŸ”¹ Logs & Traces

panels.description: Top 7 operations with the highest average response time. Useful for identifying the slowest parts of the recommendation service that may need optimization.
panels.title: Top 7 Slowest Operations (Mean Latency)

panels.description: Recent log entries from the recommendation service, including severity levels, trace/span IDs for correlation, and pod information. Use trace IDs to correlate with distributed traces.
panels.title: Recommendation Service Logs (100 recent entries)

panels.description: Distributed traces with the longest execution times, helping identify performance bottlenecks in request processing across service boundaries.
panels.title: Top Slow Traces

panels.description: Breakdown of service operations by request volume, showing the relative usage of different recommendation service functions and dependencies.
panels.title: Service Dependencies

panels.description: Infrastructure resource utilization metrics including CPU and memory usage for capacity planning and performance optimization
panels.title: ðŸ”¹ Resources

panels.description: CPU utilization per pod instance of the recommendation service. High CPU usage (>80%) may indicate processing bottlenecks or need for horizontal scaling.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory consumption per pod instance. Monitor for memory leaks or insufficient memory allocation that could impact performance. Sudden spikes may indicate memory leaks.
panels.title: Memory Usage

title: Recommendation Service Dashboard
